title: Cortex-OS Review Evidence
description: A schema for machine-readable review evidence emitted by the Reviewer neuron.

run_id.description: The ID of the run being reviewed.

status.description: The overall status of the review.

checks.description: An array of specific checks that were performed.

check_id.description: A unique identifier for the type of check.

description.description: A human-readable description of the check result.

evidence.description: A pointer to the evidence (e.g., file path and line number).
